title: nanda suta tava
sahitya:
nanda suta tava jananamindu kulE jagadIsha nandayati jagadakhilam indirAdirEsha


anupallavi

  manda manugarjati mAmsala ghanEpi dEvAnanda rUpa paramahamsanata mahAnubhAva


caraNam 1    mahitASTamI rOhiNI sahita divasa nishadE vihitanidrE khala kamsa prahita bhaTayUthE
    caraNam 2    vimala sItasa vilASu vilasandISu taTinISu kumudA mOdavati vAyau bhramati digantESu
    caraNam 3    dEva nikarE viyati divya sUnamapi varSati pAvana tApasa jAlE paramanuhruSyati
    caraNam 4    dEvakI sahita vasudEva nIradhara shObha kEvalam samstuvati mudA kEshavAbjanAbha
